title: Arnold Palmer Invitational: Rory McIlroy and Tyrrell Hatton close in on lead after third round
description: Rory McIlroy and Tyrrell Hatton both close in on the lead following impressive third rounds at the Arnold Palmer Invitational.

title: Paris St-Germain 4-2 Nantes: Kylian Mbappe scores club-record goal as Ligue 1 leaders win
description: Kylian Mbappe scores a club-record 201st goal for Paris St-Germain in an entertaining win over Nantes in Ligue 1.

title: Liverpool v Man Utd: Why Sunday is much bigger for Jurgen Klopp's side - Danny Murphy analysis
description: MOTD pundit Danny Murphy says fourth-place is everything to Liverpool now, which is why Sunday's game at Anfield is more important for his former club than it is for Manchester United.

title: Harry: I feared losing memories of mum during therapy
description: The Duke of Sussex says he showers his children with affection to avoid passing on "traumas" from his past.

title: 'Days like this win you the title' - Arsenal's amazing win after 'madness from the first second'
description: Arsenal have won games late this season - but there has been nothing like the drama of Reiss Nelson's late stunner against Bournemouth and the scenes of jubilation that followed.

title: Chelsea 1-0 Leeds: Big relief for manager Graham Potter but work still to do at Blues
description: Chelsea's win against Leeds helps ease the pressure on manager Graham Potter, but issues still remain to convince some fans he is the right man for the job.

title: Match of the Day: Ian Wright's reaction to Arsenal's late winner
description: Watch Arsenal legend and Match of the Day pundit Ian Wright's reaction to Reiss Nelson's 97th-minute winner for the Gunners against Bournemouth in the Premier League.

title: Bahrain Grand Prix: Fernando Alonso hails pace of new Aston Martin as 'too good to be true'
description: Fernando Alonso says qualifying fifth ahead of both Mercedes cars in his first race for Aston Martin felt "too good to be true".

description: Tom Pidcock becomes the first British men's winner of the prestigious Strade Bianche one-day classic in Italy.

description: Mumbai Indians thrash Gujarat Giants by 143 runs in the opening game of the Women's Premier League.

title: European Indoor Championships: Laura Muir wins 1500m gold for fifth indoor title
description: Laura Muir wins a record fifth European Indoor Championship title as she claims a dominant victory in the women's 1500m final in Istanbul.

title: European Indoor Championships: Laura Muir wins record fifth indoor gold
description: Great Britain's Laura Muir wins gold in the Women's 1500m final with a time of 4:03.40 at the European Indoor Athletics Championships at the Atakoy Athletics Arena, Istanbul.

title: Arsenal 3-2 Bournemouth: Reiss Nelson gets 97th-minute winner after visitors score inside 10 seconds
description: Reiss Nelson hits a 97th-minute winner as Premier League leaders Arsenal come from two goals down to beat Bournemouth - for whom Philip Billing had scored after 9.11 seconds.

title: Chelsea 1-0 Leeds United: Wesley Fofana scores to ease pressure on Graham Potter
description: Welsey Fofana scores his first Premier League goal for Chelsea as the Blues beat Leeds to ease the pressure on manager Graham Potter.

title: UK Weather: Snow and ice expected in Scotland and north of England
description: The Met Office says snow and ice are expected on Monday and Tuesday, and could cause travel delays.

title: Bahrain Grand Prix: Max Verstappen on pole from Sergio Perez as Red Bull lock out front row

title: Scottish bakery Morton's Rolls 'ceases trading'

title: Sergei Lavrov: Russian foreign minister laughed at for Ukraine war claims

title: NBA: Mikal Bridges leads Brooklyn Nets to huge comeback win over Boston Celtics

title: Street fighting in Bakhmut but Russia not in control - deputy mayor
